languages.text:
Впередсмотрящий: Лорд-капитан! Тревога! Еще один корабль ксеносов, идет сближающимся курсом, явно на абордаж!
Мостик: Откуда он выскочил?!
Впередсмотрящий: Прятался рядом, подошел незаметно, пока мы были отвлечены конструктом. Он прямо рядом с нами! Целится в двигательный отсек!

traits.locale_text:
Впередсмотрящий: Лорд-капитан! Тревога! Еще один корабль друкари, идет сближающимся курсом, явно на абордаж!
Мостик: Откуда он выскочил?!
Впередсмотрящий: Прятался рядом, подошел незаметно, пока мы были отвлечены Вратами. Он прямо рядом с нами! Целится в двигательный отсек!

languages.text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!
languages.original_text:
Впередсмотрящий: Лорд-капитан! Тревога! Еще один корабль ксеносов, идет сближающимся курсом, явно на абордаж!

Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby, it closed in undetected while we were distracted by the Gate. It's right near us! Aiming for the engines module!

Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!

Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

languages.text:
Vigía: ¡L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! ¡Alerta! Se acerca otra nave xenos, ¡debe de ser un grupo de abordaje!
Puente: ¿Cómo? ¿De dónde han salido?
Vigía: Se estaban escondiendo cerca. Mientras estábamos distraídos con la estructura, ha ido acercándose. ¡La tenemos encima! ¡Viene directa al módulo de motores!
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
Vigía: ¡L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! ¡Alerta! Se acerca otra nave xenos, ¡debe de ser un grupo de abordaje!
Puente: ¿Cómo? ¿De dónde han salido?
Vigía: Se estaban escondiendo cerca. Mientras estábamos distraídos con la estructura, ha ido acercándose. ¡La tenemos encima! ¡Viene directa al módulo de motores!

languages.text:
瞭望台：警报！舰长大人！又出现了一艘异形飞船，这肯定是一支登舰作战分队！
舰桥：什么？这艘飞船是从哪里出现的？
瞭望台：它一直藏在附近，趁我们的注意力被异形造物分散时悄悄地接近了我们。它就在我们旁边！朝引擎区去了！
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
瞭望台：警报！舰长大人！又出现了一艘异形飞船，这肯定是一支登舰作战分队！
舰桥：什么？这艘飞船是从哪里出现的？
瞭望台：它一直藏在附近，趁我们的注意力被异形造物分散时悄悄地接近了我们。它就在我们旁边！朝引擎区去了！

languages.text:
見張り：ロード・キャプテン、注意してください！新たな異種族の宇宙船が接近中。乗り込み部隊に違いありません！
ブリッジ：何？一体どこからやって来た？
見張り：近くに潜んでいたらしい。こちらが建造物に気を取られて、気づかず接近を許してしまいました。すぐそこにいる！エンジンモジュールを狙っています！
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
見張り：ロード・キャプテン、注意してください！新たな異種族の宇宙船が接近中。乗り込み部隊に違いありません！
ブリッジ：何？一体どこからやって来た？
見張り：近くに潜んでいたらしい。こちらが建造物に気を取られて、気づかず接近を許してしまいました。すぐそこにいる！エンジンモジュールを狙っています！

languages.text:
Beobachtungsposten: Lord Captain! Alarm! Weiteres Xenos-Schiff im Anflug, wahrscheinlich ein Entertrupp!
Brücke: Was? Woher ist es gekommen?
Beobachtungsposten: Es hatte sich in der Nähe versteckt und hat sich unbemerkt genähert, während wir mit dem Konstrukt beschäftigt waren. Es ist direkt bei uns! Es zielt auf das Triebwerksmodul!
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
Beobachtungsposten: Lord Captain! Alarm! Weiteres Xenos-Schiff im Anflug, wahrscheinlich ein Entertrupp!
Brücke: Was? Woher ist es gekommen?
Beobachtungsposten: Es hatte sich in der Nähe versteckt und hat sich unbemerkt genähert, während wir mit dem Konstrukt beschäftigt waren. Es ist direkt bei uns! Es zielt auf das Triebwerksmodul!

languages.text:
Vigie : {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Alerte ! Un autre vaisseau xénos est en approche, probablement pour nous aborder !
Passerelle : Quoi ? Mais d'où vient-il ?
Vigie : Il se cachait à proximité. Il a dû se rapprocher discrètement pendant que nous observions la structure. Il est juste à côté de nous ! Il cible le module des moteurs !
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
Vigie : {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Alerte ! Un autre vaisseau xénos est en approche, probablement pour nous aborder !
Passerelle : Quoi ? Mais d'où vient-il ?
Vigie : Il se cachait à proximité. Il a dû se rapprocher discrètement pendant que nous observions la structure. Il est juste à côté de nous ! Il cible le module des moteurs !

languages.text:
Gözcü Karakolu: Lord Kaptan! Acil durum! Bir zeno gemisi daha menzile girdi, gemiyi bordalamaya çalışabilirler!
Köprü: Ne? Bu gemi de nereden çıktı?
Gözcü Karakolu: Yakınlarda gizleniyormuş. Biz yapıyla ilgilenirken tespit edilmeden arayı kapattılar. Hemen arkamızda! Motor modülüne nişan alıyor!
languages.original_text:
Lookout: Lord Captain! Alert! Another xenos ship inbound, must be a boarding party!
Bridge: What? Where did it come from?
Lookout: It was hiding nearby. It closed in undetected while we were distracted by the construct. It's right by us! It's aiming for the engines module!

traits.locale_text:
Gözcü Karakolu: Lord Kaptan! Acil durum! Bir zeno gemisi daha menzile girdi, gemiye binmeye çalışabilirler!
Köprü: Ne? Bu gemi de nereden çıktı?
Gözcü Karakolu: Yakınlarda gizleniyormuş. Biz yapıyla ilgilenirken tespit edilmeden arayı kapattılar. Hemen arkamızda! Motor modülüne nişan alıyor!
